name: Steal the Steel!
description:
Play as a crafty goblin archer and sneak around an army of surly dwarves to snatch their painstakingly crafted weapons for yourself!

Controls:

Arrows - Movement

Space - Fire

Shift (Hold) - Walk

Control (Hold) - Aiming Mode (while standing still)

This is my first completely playable game and was made as my project for Unity's Junior Programmer Learning Path.

The browser version is playable on Unity Play: 

https://play.unity.com/mg/other/steal-the-steel

"Goblin Miners" and "Lodestone Mine" by Derek Fietcher: 

https://www.youtube.com/c/DerekFiechter
